channel.title: Endogenous Labor Supply on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Endogenous Labor Supply on Lionel Ragot

item.title: Pollution effects on preferences: A unified approach
item.description: In this paper, we introduce a unified Ramsey model where pollution has an impact on preferences and affects both consumption demand and labor supply.

item.title: Pollution effects on labor supply and growth
item.description: In this paper we study the short- and long-run effects of pollution in a Ramsey model where pollution and labor supply are non-separable arguments in householdsâ€™ preferences.
